main_definition: Bald refers to a person who has little or no hair on their head, but it can also be used as an idiom to describe certain situations or characteristics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having very little or no hair on the scalp
meanings_and_examples.example: My grandfather is bald and has a full head of gray hair.
He always tries to avoid confrontation by being too 'bald' in his decision-making.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informal term for an underwhelming idea or solution that lacks creativity
meanings_and_examples.example: Their proposal was so bald it failed to impress the judges at the competition.
